amendment.description: To extend the authority for the personnel program for scientific and technical personnel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4493 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4493 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6346) To extend the authority for the personnel program for scientific and technical personnel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4493 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4493 proposed by Senator Warner.
